doc:
John Elliott (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Elliott_(actor) 0 Elliott Pershing Stitzel (November 27, 1918 – May 21, 2005), better known by his stage name Stephen Elliott, was an American actor. His best known roles were that of the prospective father-in-law, Burt Johnson, in the hit 1981 film Arthur and as Chief Hubbard in the 1984 blockbuster Beverly Hills Cop. Elliott_Pershing_Stitzel ( November_27_,_1918 – May_21_,_2005 ) , better_known by his_stage_name_Stephen_Elliott , was an_American_actor . His_best_known_roles were that of the_prospective_father-in-law , Burt_Johnson , in the_hit_1981_film Arthur and as Chief_Hubbard in the_1984_blockbuster_Beverly_Hills_Cop .
